entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow or rain. Low zero.
